joehung302 wrote:
> ...

> - I didn't set bdb cache.
> (current setting is <integer name="bdb-cache-percent">0</integer>).

For sure change this.... knock it down to 20 or 30 pecent.  Default is 
60% of heap. This and your 500meg bloom filter doesn't leave too much 
space for all else.

St.Ack
